about_the_game:
REKA is a rich exploration game with building and crafting elements!

Begin your journey as Reka, an apprentice to the legendary witch, Baba Jaga. Deep in the autumnal woodlands, learn and practice your witchcraft as you summon to life your own iconic chicken-legged cottage. Venture through the beautiful scenic world as you solve quests, forage for ingredients, and uncover Baba Jaga’s harrowing secrets…



Build, decorate and customise your enchanted ambling cottage, a haven from an unpredictable, sometimes dark world and a personal place to practice your magic.



Discover yourself in this enchanting journey with fully customisable character creator tools. Harness the power of nature and earthly spirits to become a powerful witch.



Journey through a deep and diverging land of forests, swamps and villages, discovering animals, spirits and numerous secrets on your way.



Every journey begins from nothing – become Reka and begin yours.

🚪 Construct, bewitch and journey with your very own witch home!
🪑 Decorate and create your own haven with ultimate placement freedom.
🍂 Forge your path through breath-taking, procedurally generated, natural landscapes.
🐈 Discover and tame wildlife to join you on your adventure, or bring them home!
🗝️ Discover settlements, accept quests, and decide whether to help or hinder local villagers.
🧙🏽‍♀️ Create your own witch with fully customisable character creation tools.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6400 Or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB Or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 Or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 Or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
